pages.text: This Chapter is a Work in Progress.$(br2)Hexhaven has a player-built and player-maintained train line! To begin your journey on the train line, head to the train station at $(c:/spawn)spawn$(/c)!$(br2)The train line has plans to run across the entire build border!

For more information about the train line, check out this $(l:https://discord.com/channels/1076365835284787220/1222978303401529404)Discord Thread$(/l) dedicated to it!$(br2)The thread can also be found in the $(l)#hexhaven-chat$() channel, called $(l)Train Thread!
